font_colour.label: Font Colour
font_colour.help: This is the default colour of the text on your store.

link_colour.label: Link Colour
link_colour.help: This is the colour of the links on your site.

link_hover_colour.label: Link Hover Colour
link_hover_colour.help: This is the colour that the links go when you hover.

font_size.label: Font Size
font_size.help: This value will be the size of the default text around the site. It's not common to change this from 10-11px.

show_categories.label: Show Categories?
show_categories.help: This control decides whether to show the categories along the top of the page, or not.

layout.label: Page Layout
layout.help: This is the main structural layout of the page.

pager_border.label: Show Pager Border?
pager_border.help: This control decides whether to draw, or not to draw, the border around the pager toolbar containing the page numbers, etc.

pager_background.label: Pager Background Colour
pager_background.help: This control decides what the background colour of the pager toolbar containing the page numbers, etc, should be.
